TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 与 事件结合使用，当特定 的解析请求完成时，就会终止此事件。

span.span: Used in conjunction with the event, which is signaled when a resolve request for a specific has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 ResolveCompletedEventArgs 对象, 请实例化对象, 并使用其中一种解析方法。To use the ResolveCompletedEventArgs object, instantiate a object and utilize one of the Resolve methods. 对于异步处理, 请使用方法。For asynchronous processing, use the method. 当解析程序已到达要查询的云的末尾, 或已达到它所构造的记录条目的最大数目时, 将引发用于完成解析过程的事件, 并将关联的委托导致 ResolveAsync 完成。When the Resolver has reached the end of the Cloud(s) to query for the , or it has reached the maximum number of record entries for the it is constructing, the event to complete the resolve process is raised, and the associated delegate causes ResolveAsync to complete. 对于不返回集合的异常完成, 还可以引发事件。The event can also be raised for abnormal completions, which do not return a collection. 仅当找到所有终结点后, 才引发此事件。This event is raised only once when all endpoints have been found. 对此解析程序对象的此实例的所有引用都与提供的标记进行协调, 后者是此异步解析请求的开发人员确定的唯一标识符。All references to this instance of the Resolver object are coordinated with a supplied token, which is a unique, developer-determined identifier for this asynchronous resolve request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PeerNameRecordCollection As PeerNameRecordCollection

summary.span: 获取要解析的 对象。

value.span: 要解析的 对象就是在特定 的 操作的响应中发现的对象。

span.span: The object to resolve is the one found in response to a operation on a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在查询了所有云的此对等名称或检索到的对等名称记录的最大数目后, 将引发此事件。This event is raised when all clouds have been queried for this peer name, or when the maximum number of peer name records has been retrieved. 它通过将对等名称记录集合放入 OnResolveCompleted 方法正在等待的事件自变量中来引发。It is raised by putting the peer name record collection into the event argument for which the OnResolveCompleted method is waiting. 状态更改 awakens 过程。The change in state awakens the process. 除非显式指定，否则针对所有引用类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 `null`，针对 `int` 类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 0。Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type `int`. 如果未找到任何记录, `null`则返回。If no records were found, `null` is returned.
